sentences.en: Few places have a citizenry that is more environmentally conscious.
sentences.cn: 少数地方的公民环境意识更强了.

sentences.en: He used the medium of radio when he wanted to enlist public support or reassure the citizenry.
sentences.cn: 当他想得到公众支持或恢复民信时，他使用广播作载体。

sentences.en: I think we lack a citizenry that is adequately willing to take responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们缺乏非常愿意承担责任的公民。

sentences.en: The priests of Zakarum and the citizenry of Khanduras recognized the disturbing change within their liege.
sentences.cn: 扎卡鲁姆的牧师们和坎多拉斯的公民开始注意到他们君主身上发生的怪异变化.

sentences.en: To love the country is to love its citizenry. This is fundamental.
sentences.cn: 因此,爱国就是爱全体人民,这是爱国主义的根本所在.

words.tran_cn: [法] 公民身份，公民资格；国籍；公民权

trans.tran_cn: 全体国民，全体州居民，全体市民
trans.tran_en: all the citizens in a particular town, country, or state
